question: How does the person squeeze the foam?
options: The person presses the foam with both hands together.
The person pinches the foam between the thumb and index finger of the left hand.
The person holds the foam with both hands and twists it gently.
The person squishes the foam with her right hand while putting dishwashing soap in her left hand.
The person taps the foam softly with the palm of the right hand.
